questions.question: What would have happened if Tom had remembered his umbrella?
Choose the correct third conditional sentence involving an invitation.
options: If we invited her, she would come.
If we had invited her, she would have come.
If we have invited her, she would come.
If we invite her, she comes.
questions.answer: If we had invited her, she would have come.

questions.question: Which option correctly completes this third conditional sentence: 'If I had not forgotten the tickets, we _____ the concert.'
